attributes.action: ban the retail sector from operating on the 26th December (Boxing Day) each year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The retail sector are forgetting the fact that Boxing Day is a time of rest - opening sometimes at 5PM. We the undersigned want to see a ban in all retail operations on Boxing Day - that includes stopping sales from starting that day to. It should therefore be replaced by a day of rest for everyone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
